metadata.name: Sisters
metadata.description:
An ordinary day in the high villages of Turkey.Here women start to work with the sunrise.Two older sisters Emine and Havva are doing their daily work.Emine is knitting the rope she will use to carry feed for the animals. Eve is getting ready for dinner. He grinds the corn with an old hand mill.The sunrise and the heat in the stove accompany them.

Edition: 1/1
Size: 4682 × 3125
Location: Trabzon/Turkey
Photographer : Ali  Mermertaş
Date: 01.12.2021
Nikon D610  15mm

 I was born in 1984 in Trabzon. I graduated from chemistry and photography department. My hobby, which I started during my university years, turned into a passion over the years. I went to many parts of Turkey for photography. Since 2006 I have been taking photographs and participating in photography competitions. I have over 100 national and international awards.
